segments.text: Tom , did you see the film last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did , I thought it was a failure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you really think so ? I don't think so . It wasn't that bad film at all . Didn't you hear the applause of the audience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , maybe so . But I still think everyone has their rights of their own opinion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't see the point of arguing this .
segments.speaker: S1
